entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
@BernieSanders "It’s pathetic and unacceptable that, while reports of coronavirus infection continue to grow and economic concerns rise..." that you are spewing hateful rhetoric about @realDonaldTrump. Instead, you should be working with him to fix this! Hypocrite!

#Trump2020NowMoreThanEver
